panels.description: Display the Micrometer gauge metrics (actuator_health_*) that are exported to the  /metrics endpoint.
panels.title: Actuator Health

alert.message: Actuator Health for test-code-quality-tools-api is failing. Manually check https://test-code-quality-tools-api.prod.triplelift.net/health for test-code-quality-tools-api health. Then check https://test-code-quality-tools-api.prod.triplelift.net/metrics to see if the 'actuator_health_*' stats are being output.
alert.name: Actuator Health Alert

panels.description: The same as the Actuator Health panel (panelId=40) with the addition of alerting.
panels.title: Actuator Health with Alerting
GraphQL query success & failure rates and error ratio
